Generation VIII.Sword: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.
Generation VIII.Shield: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 9 , Lake of Outrage , West Lake Axewell ( Wanderer ) North Lake Miloch , Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 9 , Lake of Outrage , West Lake Axewell ( Wanderer ) North Lake Miloch , Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
